Cyber Pool Ravencoin Stratum - v1.0.1 Special Edition
================@

Use With NodeJS To Build Your Own Ravencoin Pool.

Fixed Version Working With Cli GetKawPoWHash And GetKawPoWDiff !

Fixed NiceHash Compatibility !
